TextEng: "Never mind."
"I think we need to part ways."
"All right, fine. Stay with me, then."
"Wait here until I return."
"Go on. Maybe we'll meet later."
"I want to change your tactics."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I don't want you to cast any spells until I say otherwise."
Text: "내가 달리 말하기 전까지 주문을 시전하지 마."

TextEng: "I want you to go ahead and cast spells on your own."
"Do not try to use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "파티원의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용하지 마."

TextEng: "Use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "파티원의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용해."

TextEng: "I want you to leave any traps that you see alone for now."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"Don't try to be stealthy anymore."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
"Try to remain stealthy all the time."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 돕지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
Stay a long distance away.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay close.
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
Text: "날 방어하고 내가 공격하기 전까지 공격하지 마."

TextEng: "I want to adjust your equipment."
"Can you identify my equipment?"
"I need you to cast a spell."
"Never mind."
"Ultravision."
"True Seeing."
"Summon Creature IX."
"Summon Creature VIII."
"Summon Creature VII."
"Summon Creature VI."
"Summon Creature V."
"Summon Creature IV."
"Summon Creature III."
"Summon Creature II."
"Summon Creature I."
"Stoneskin."
"Spell Resistance."
"Spell Mantle."
"Shield of Faith."
"Shield."
"Shadow Shield."
"See Invisibility."
"Sanctuary."
"Restoration."
"Resistance."
"Resist Elements."
"Remove Paralysis."
"Remove Fear."
"Remove Disease."
"Remove Curse."
"Remove Blindness/Deafness."
"Regenerate."
"Protection From Spells."
"Protection From Elements."
"Premonition."
"Prayer."
"Owl's Wisdom."
"Neutralize poison."
"Monstrous Regeneration."
"Minor Globe of Invulnerability."
"Mind Blank."
"Mestil's Acid Sheath."
"Mass Haste."
"Magical Vestment."
"Mage Armor."
"Light."
"Lesser Spell Mantle."
"Lesser Restoration."
"Lesser Mind Blank"
"Lesser Dispel."
"Knock."
"Invisibility Sphere."
"Invisibility."
"Improved Invisibility."
"Haste."
"Greater Stoneskin."
"Greater Spell Mantle."
"Greater Sanctuary."
"Greater Restoration."
"Greater Dispelling."
"Globe of Invulnerability."
"Ghostly Visage."
"Freedom of Movement."
"Fox's Cunning."
"Find Traps."
"Ethereal Visage."
"Entropic Shield."
"Energy Buffer."
"No, I've changed my mind."
"Yes, go ahead."
"Endure Elements."
"Endurance."
"Elemental Shield."
"Eagle's Splendor."
"Divine Power."
"Displacement."
"Dispel Magic."
"Death Ward."
"Death Armor."
"Create Undead."
"Continual Flame."
"Clarity."
"Cat's Grace."
"Bull's Strength."
"I've changed my mind."
"Cast on all the party members."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77109>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77108>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77107>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77106>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77105>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77104>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77103>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77102>."
"Cast it on <CUSTOM77101>."
"Cast it on my animal companion."
"Cast it on my familiar."
"Cast it on me."
"Cast it on yourself."
"Bless."
"Animate Dead."
"Aid."
"I need you to cast a group of buffing spells."
"Never mind."
"Cast all the buffing spells you have."
"Cast all the buffing spells that last a long time."
"Cast all the short duration buffing spells."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"That's all for now."
"No, nothing else."
"How are you doing? Is anything wrong?"
"I wish to discuss your training."
"I'd like you to go back to finding a balance between the two."
Text: "둘 사이의 균형을 찾는 걸로 돌아갔으면 좋겠어."

TextEng: "Continue with what you're doing now."
"Concentrate on becoming an assassin."
"I want you to focus exclusively on your mage training."
"I want to talk more about the lost souls."
"What do they say to you?"
"I think it's just your guilty conscience acting up."
"That's ridiculous."
"If you're losing your sanity, I can replace you!"
Text: "제정신을 잃고 있다면, 널 교체할 수 있어!"

TextEng: "Well, you killed them. I guess they'd be angry with you."
"You can't let yourself continue to be haunted by your past."
"I'm sick of this. You deal with this problem, now!"
"You have to be strong, Nathyrra. You have to resist them."
"You're not what you once were, Nathyrra. The spirits have no claim over you."
Text: "넌 예전의 네가 아니야, 나시라. 영혼들이 널 요구할 권리는 없어."

TextEng: "You can, Nathyrra. I believe in you. You are stronger than you realize."
Text: "할 수 있어, 나시라. 널 믿어. 넌 네가 생각하는 것보다 강해."

TextEng: "But you aren't alone, my love. I'm with you. Always."
Text: "하지만 넌 혼자가 아니야, 사랑하는 이여. 내가 함께 있어. 항상."

TextEng: "What do you plan to do after all this?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 생각이야?"

TextEng: "You could find plenty of work as an assassin on the surface."
Text: "지상에서 암살자로 일거리를 많이 찾을 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "You've gone soft!"
"I think trying to help others in the Underdark is a noble goal."
Text: "언더다크의 다른 이들을 돕는 건 고귀한 목표라고 생각해."

TextEng: "There are people who need saving on the surface, too."
"When the time comes, I'm sure you'll make the right choice."
Text: "때가 되면 올바른 선택을 할 거라고 확신해."

TextEng: "Sounds like you want to change all of drow society."
Text: "드로우 사회 전체를 바꾸고 싶은 것 같은데."

TextEng: "Maybe you could stay with me."
"Fine. Choose Eilistraee instead of me."
"We can make it work."
"Wherever you go, I'll go with you."
"I want to talk to you about Eilistraee."
"Just tell me what you can."
"What do the followers of Eilistraee believe in?"
"Sounds like a stupid religion to me."
"If anyone can be saved, what about the Valsharess?"
"I'm glad you've found your salvation."
"We've all done terrible things in our past. You just deal with it."
Text: "우리 모두 과거에 끔찍한 일을 했어. 그냥 받아들이는 거야."

TextEng: "You have to learn to leave the past in the past, Nathyrra."
Text: "과거를 과거로 남겨두는 법을 배워야 해, 나시라."

TextEng: "Maybe part of worshipping Eilistraee is learning to forgive yourself."
Text: "어쩌면 에일리스트레이를 숭배하는 것의 일부는 자신을 용서하는 법을 배우는 거야."

TextEng: "Don't let those dreams get in the way of our mission!"
Text: "그 꿈들이 우리 임무를 방해하게 하지 마!"

TextEng: "Is there anything I can do to help?"
"If Eilistraee preaches mercy and forgiveness, why are we doing so much killing in her service?"
Text: "에일리스트레이가 자비와 용서를 설파한다면, 왜 우리는 그녀를 섬기며 이렇게 많은 살육을 하는 거야?"

TextEng: "Is that why you're helping me now? Some kind of penance for past sins?"
Text: "그게 지금 날 돕는 이유야? 과거의 죄에 대한 일종의 속죄?"

TextEng: "I want to know more about House Kant'tar."
"I suppose you really didn't have any other choice."
Text: "정말 다른 선택의 여지가 없었던 것 같네."

TextEng: "House Kant'tar, the Valsharess, the Seer: your loyalty seems rather fickle."
Text: "칸타르 가문, 발샤레스, 선견자: 네 충성심은 꽤 변덕스러워 보여."

TextEng: "I just hope you don't switch sides yet again."
"I'm glad you're on our side now."
"I can see your conversion is sincere."
"Pretty words, but they don't mean much coming from you."
Text: "좋은 말이지만, 너한테서 나온 말은 별 의미가 없어."

TextEng: "You don't have to walk this path alone, Nathyrra. I will be there to help you."
Text: "이 길을 혼자 걸을 필요 없어, 나시라. 내가 도울게."

TextEng: "It doesn't seem that different to me."
"I'm not sure I understand."
"I'm glad you did. Otherwise we would never have met."
Text: "그래서 다행이야. 그렇지 않았다면 우린 만나지 못했을 테니."

TextEng: "I hope you won't discard me so easily."
"Didn't you want revenge?"
"I want to know more about the Red Sisters."
"All right, if you'd rather not talk about it..."
"So tell me about the training."
"Actually, I don't want to talk about this."
"Obviously you were the survivor from your class."
"That hardly seems like an efficient way to do things."
"It's always good to have an edge."
"So how did you finally kill her?"
"But the instructors said that wasn't allowed!"
"You're a horrible person!"
"But you cheated!"
"You like to play by your own rules, don't you?"
Text: "네 자신의 규칙대로 하는 걸 좋아하지, 그렇지?"

TextEng: "Remind me to keep an eye on you when I go to sleep."
"They should have just graduated you both."
"You used magic? That's hardly fair!"
"That's what I like about you - you know how to use all your assets!"
Text: "그게 네가 좋은 점이야 - 모든 수단을 활용할 줄 알잖아!"

TextEng: "I want to know more about you."
"No, not yet. Stay here."
"Yes, come along."
"Not right now, Nathyrra."
"Yes, Nathyrra?"
"Wow, you've got a great grasp of the bloody obvious!"
"All I feel is the need to find a way out of this place."
Text: "내가 느끼는 건 이곳을 빠져나갈 방법을 찾아야 한다는 것뿐이야."

TextEng: "Isn't that a cheery thought."
"You can feel the lost souls?"
"Can we just move on?"
"I don't hear anything."
"Maybe we don't want to hear what they're saying."
Text: "아마 그들이 하는 말을 듣고 싶지 않을 거야."

TextEng: "Maybe they're trying to warn us."
"Well, we are in the one of the Nine Hells. It isn't supposed to be pleasant."
Text: "뭐, 우린 구층 지옥 중 하나에 있잖아. 쾌적할 리가 없지."

TextEng: "But the cold makes your lips such a pretty shade of blue."
Text: "하지만 추위가 네 입술을 아주 예쁜 푸른색으로 만들어주네."

TextEng: "Quit stalling. Out with it."
"What is it, Nathyrra?"
"I didn't have a choice. That's the only reason I helped you."
Text: "선택의 여지가 없었어. 그게 널 도운 유일한 이유야."

TextEng: "I want to stop Mephistopheles, yes."
"All I care about is getting out of the Nine Hells."
Text: "내가 신경 쓰는 건 구층 지옥에서 빠져나가는 것뿐이야."

TextEng: "Nope."
"I would have helped even if it wasn't for the geas on me."
"It didn't help much. Now we've got Mephistopheles to deal with."
Text: "별로 도움이 안 됐어. 이제 메피스토펠레스를 상대해야 하잖아."

TextEng: "Really? I just consider you a glorified servant."
Text: "정말? 난 그냥 너를 화려한 하인 정도로 생각해."

TextEng: "I consider you a friend, too."
"We could be more than just friends, Nathyrra."
Text: "우린 그냥 친구 이상이 될 수 있어, 나시라."

TextEng: "You think you could do better, drow? You're no prize, yourself!"
Text: "네가 더 잘할 수 있다고 생각해, 드로우? 너도 별거 아니잖아!"

TextEng: "Never mind. Let's just move on."
"It's okay, Nathyrra. I understand."
"Really? I don't feel anything for you."
"Aw, I didn't know you cared..."
"I'm sorry. Go on."
"Let me save you some time: I *don't* have any feelings for you, Nathyrra."
Text: "시간 좀 아껴줄게: 난 너한테 아무 감정도 *없어*, 나시라."

TextEng: "Someone you love?"
"And I love you."
"We still have to find a way out of here, Nathyrra."
Text: "우린 여전히 여기서 빠져나갈 방법을 찾아야 해, 나시라."

TextEng: "So what happens now?"
"What about your faith? What about Eilistraee?"
"I consider you a friend, Nathyrra. Nothing more. I'm sorry."
Text: "난 너를 친구라고 생각해, 나시라. 그 이상은 아니야. 미안해."

TextEng: "I do, Nathyrra. I love you."
"Humor is part of my romantic charm."
"I feel close to you too, Nathyrra."
"Right now all I think about is killing the Valsharess!"
Text: "지금 내가 생각하는 건 발샤레스를 죽이는 것뿐이야!"

TextEng: "Who cares about the surface?! We've got more important things to worry about!"
Text: "지상이 뭐가 중요해?! 걱정할 더 중요한 게 있잖아!"

TextEng: "It's pretty boring compared to the Underdark."
"Well, they aren't too fond of drow up there."
"You'll see it for yourself, someday."
"The surface is beautiful."
"Yes, I suppose I will."
Why? Do you want to run away together?
"I'm going to slaughter the Valsharess like a hog!"
"Killed the Seer? What do you mean?"
"I don't have time for this story!"
"I haven't heard this tale yet."
"Why were you sent to kill the Seer?"
"Then what happened?"
"So she sent you to end the problem."
Text: "그래서 그녀가 문제를 끝내라고 널 보낸 거네."

TextEng: "Maybe studying Eilistraee's teachings made you more open to the idea of a conversion."
Text: "어쩌면 에일리스트레이의 가르침을 공부한 게 개종에 더 열린 마음을 갖게 한 거야."

TextEng: "But you couldn't kill her?"
"We should probably continue on with our quest."
Text: "아마 우리 임무를 계속해야 할 것 같아."

TextEng: "You're weak! I would have killed her!"
"And you've served the Seer ever since?"
"She had seen you in a vision, hadn't she?"
"Obviously you don't feel that way now."
"Are you saying you doubted the Seer's visions?"
"The Seer believes in me because of her visions."
"I don't like you spying on me, drow!"
"Really? Who?"
"Why do I remind you of <him/her>?"
"I remind you of a slave?"
"I really don't care about this."
"Seelamin is in your past. <He/She>'s not here now."
"What happened to <him/her>?"
"Wait a minute - the Valsharess destroyed your House?"
"Let me guess... you helped the Valsharess destroy House Kant'tar."
Text: "추측하자면... 넌 발샤레스가 칸타르 가문을 멸망시키는 걸 도왔지."

TextEng: "Did you have anything to do with House Kant'tar's fall?"
"If she destroyed your House, why did you join the Red Sisters?"
Text: "그녀가 네 가문을 멸망시켰는데, 왜 붉은 자매단에 합류했어?"

TextEng: "Just make a long story short and get to the point!"
"Is the story over yet? Sorry, I dozed off there for a bit."
"We should probably get back to our mission."
Text: "아마 우리 임무로 돌아가야 할 것 같아."

TextEng: "How could you go work for the woman who killed your family?"
Text: "어떻게 네 가족을 죽인 여자를 위해 일할 수 있었어?"

TextEng: "Weren't you worried it was a trap?"
"Weren't you worried it was a trap?"
"How could you go work for the woman who killed your family?"
Text: "어떻게 네 가족을 죽인 여자를 위해 일할 수 있었어?"

TextEng: "I don't get it. How did you end up joining the Red Sisters?"
Text: "이해가 안 가. 어떻게 붉은 자매단에 합류하게 됐어?"

TextEng: "So you went into hiding?"
"So you've been watching me? See anything you like?"
Text: "그래서 날 지켜봤어? 마음에 드는 거 있었어?"

TextEng: "Is there some point to this?"
"I knew you couldn't be trusted!"
"How do I know you're not a spy, pretending to help us?"
Text: "우릴 돕는 척하는 첩자가 아니라는 걸 어떻게 알아?"

TextEng: "You turned on the Valsharess. Next you might turn on us."
Text: "발샤레스를 배신했어. 다음엔 우릴 배신할 수도 있지."

TextEng: "I'm sorry, Nathyrra. I trust you."
"No wonder you know so much about her."
Text: "네가 그녀에 대해 많이 아는 게 당연하네."

TextEng: "I don't know if I want you traveling with me anymore."
Text: "더 이상 너랑 같이 여행하고 싶은지 모르겠어."

TextEng: "No, I want you to go."
"Fine, I'll keep you around. But I'm watching you!"
"I trust you, Nathyrra."
"Can you blame them?"
"You worked for our enemy?"
"I'm glad you're on our side now, Nathyrra."
"So you were an assassin. Who cares?"
"The past is in the past, Nathyrra."
"The Red Sisters?"
"What are you talking about?"
"Are you going to tell me what the problem is or not?"
"This isn't the best time for this, Nathyrra."
"Let's go."
<StartAction>[Deekin]</Start> "Ixthyria the Scalesinger..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Believe in yourself, Deekin."
"You're kind, you're talented, you're funny. You don't need me anymore. If I die, you'll be all right."
Text: "넌 친절하고, 재능 있고, 재미있어. 더 이상 날 필요로 하지 않아. 내가 죽어도, 넌 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "Not if I can help it. Come, we have an adventure to finish."
Text: "내가 도울 수 있다면 그렇지 않아. 와, 끝내야 할 모험이 있어."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me, little one!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
<StartAction>[Valen]</Start> "Oeskathine the Demonwrestler..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"I hereby free you from your infernal taint."
"You're welcome."
"Glad you like it. Now give me your soul."
Text: "마음에 들어서 다행이야. 이제 네 영혼을 내게 줘."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no."
"Sorry, my love, but this is it for us."
"Yes, I am."
"Good. Now, in repayment, you are to become my lover forever."
Text: "좋아. 이제, 보답으로, 넌 영원히 내 연인이 되는 거야."

TextEng: "Well... perhaps not."
"You heard me."
"We're done. For now."
"You don't frighten me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "날 겁주지 못해. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"So there's hope for us after all?"
"Does it really feel that different?"
"I'm glad. You certainly earned it."
<StartAction>[Aribeth]</Start> "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "You are right. I will not ask that of you."
"Don't you see? This is your atonement... It's all right..."
"I just don't want to see you suffer so."
Text: "그저 네가 그렇게 고통받는 걸 보고 싶지 않을 뿐이야."

TextEng: "Yes, Aribeth. Dead and cold..."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue evil, not good."
"I command you to love me..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no..."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue good, not evil."
"I command you to love me!"
"That is all, Aribeth."
<StartAction>[Nathyrra]</Start> "Qeyifalia the Skyseeker..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Your anger is nothing to me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "네 분노는 내게 아무것도 아니야. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"Forgive yourself for your past crimes."
"I won't do anything to harm you, Nathyrra."
Text: "너에게 해가 되는 건 하지 않을게, 나시라."

TextEng: "I'm really getting sick of this! Get over it already!"
"Enough with the chit-chat! I just want to kill Mephistopheles!"
Text: "잡담은 그만! 난 그냥 메피스토펠레스를 죽이고 싶어!"

TextEng: "I can't help you with this, Nathyrra."
"You have to learn to forgive yourself, Nathyrra."
"In time you'll learn to forgive yourself, Nathyrra."
Text: "시간이 지나면 자신을 용서하는 법을 배울 거야, 나시라."

TextEng: "I'll help you through this, Nathyrra. I love you, remember?"
Text: "이걸 헤쳐나갈 수 있게 도와줄게, 나시라. 사랑한다는 거 기억해?"

TextEng: "Why must you two always fight? Fine, I love neither of you!"
Text: "왜 너희 둘은 항상 싸워야 해? 좋아, 둘 다 사랑하지 않아!"

TextEng: "Forgive me... I'm sorry, Nathyrra, but it's Aribeth I love."
Text: "용서해... 미안해, 나시라, 하지만 내가 사랑하는 건 아리베스야."

TextEng: "Leave us be, Aribeth. I loved Nathyrra first and best."
Text: "우릴 내버려둬, 아리베스. 나시라를 먼저 그리고 가장 사랑했어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I have love enough for the both of you."
"Why must you two always fight? Fine, I love neither of you!"
Text: "왜 너희 둘은 항상 싸워야 해? 좋아, 둘 다 사랑하지 않아!"

TextEng: "Forgive me... I'm sorry, Nathyrra, but it's Aribeth I love."
Text: "용서해... 미안해, 나시라, 하지만 내가 사랑하는 건 아리베스야."

TextEng: "Leave us be, Aribeth. I loved Nathyrra first and best."
Text: "우릴 내버려둬, 아리베스. 나시라를 먼저 그리고 가장 사랑했어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I have love enough for the both of you."
"You're welcome, Deekin."
"The Reaper has always referred to it as his realm, nothing else."
Text: "사신은 항상 그것을 자신의 영역이라고 부를 뿐이야."

TextEng: "He's an ally. That's all you need to know."
"I don't know what he is. A demon, perhaps? He just is."
"Enough questions. The Reaper is an ally. That's all you need to know."
Text: "질문은 그만. 사신은 동맹이야. 그것만 알면 돼."

TextEng: "No... not really. He said something about a nexus, but I didn't really get it."
Text: "아니... 별로. 경계 영역에 대해 뭐라고 했는데, 잘 이해 못 했어."

TextEng: "This place is a nexus, or so the Reaper says. I'm not sure I understand it all."
Text: "이곳은 경계 영역이라고, 사신이 그러는데. 전부 이해하는지 확신이 안 서."

TextEng: "The Reaper says his realm is a nexus. It connects to many places, but not all."
Text: "사신은 자신의 영역이 경계 영역이라고 해. 많은 곳과 연결되지만, 전부는 아니야."

TextEng: "Why don't you ask him yourself?"
"Are you done yapping? I'd like to try and find a way out of here."
Text: "떠들기 끝났어? 여기서 나갈 방법을 찾고 싶은데."

TextEng: "Do you know anything about this place?"
"Seems a bit... cold to be one of the Hells, doesn't it?"
"What was your first clue?"
"That's very helpful. What would I do if you weren't here to point out the blatantly obvious?"
Text: "정말 도움이 되네. 네가 여기서 뻔한 걸 지적하지 않았다면 어쩔 뻔했어?"

TextEng: "Not if we find it first!"
"If they try anything, I'll slaughter them all!"
"When I hack my way to the Elder Brain, it'll negotiate with me!"
Text: "엘더 브레인까지 베고 가면, 나랑 협상할 거야!"

TextEng: "What could I use to protect my mind?"
Text: "내 정신을 보호하는 데 뭘 쓸 수 있을까?"

TextEng: "What about your mind?"
"Then we shouldn't have any problems."
"I can't imagine you as anybody's thrall."
"You as my servant? Does this mean you'll cook and clean for me?"
Text: "넌 내 하인? 그럼 날 위해 요리하고 청소해준다는 거야?"

TextEng: "This isn't drow society. Around here, the man is in charge!"
Text: "여긴 드로우 사회가 아니야. 여기선 남자가 담당이야!"

TextEng: "No wonder you're so bossy."
"Enough of this. Let's just move on."
"When I want your advice, I'll ask for it."
"You're sure cute when you're angry."
"Wow - you're not only bossy, you're defensive, too."
"I've noticed that about you."
"It wasn't a compliment. Believe me. Let's just move on."
"No, you're just bossy."
"It *was* a compliment. I like bossy, domineering women."
"This helmet will protect me from them."
"I'm not afraid of a few zombies!"
"You think the undead are inside the temple?"
"I'm getting sick of your whining, drow!"
"Whatever we find, I'll destroy it!"
"Don't worry, I'll be careful in there."
"Do you think it's some kind of trap?"
"They're probably slaves, then."
"We won't get to the bottom of this by standing here."
Text: "여기 서 있어서는 이걸 끝까지 알아낼 수 없어."

TextEng: "We'll have to investigate to find out."
"Maybe they aren't what they appear."
"So what? Who cares?"
"What good are you if you can't cast any spells?"
Text: "주문 하나 시전 못 하면 무슨 소용이야?"

TextEng: "Good. Now we don't have to worry about an enemy's spell killing us."
Text: "좋아. 이제 적의 주문이 우릴 죽일까 걱정 안 해도 돼."

TextEng: "A dead magic zone? How is that possible?"
"Maybe we'll learn more about them if we look around."
Text: "둘러보면 그들에 대해 더 알 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "Maybe some long forgotten race left them here."
Text: "어쩌면 오래 잊혀진 종족이 여기 남겨둔 걸 수도."

TextEng: "Come on. The sooner we find this Eye Tyrant, the sooner this is over."
Text: "가자. 이 눈알 폭군을 빨리 찾을수록, 빨리 끝나."

TextEng: "What's the matter? Are you scared?"
"There might be slaves in here, too."
"Don't worry, I'll keep my eyes peeled."
"It's just a joke. Relax."
"I'm sorry... I didn't mean anything by it."
"I don't need you mothering me, drow!"
"I haven't run into anything I can't handle, yet."
Text: "아직 감당 못 할 것과 마주친 적 없어."

TextEng: "Nobody said this was going to be easy."
Text: "이게 쉬울 거라고 아무도 말 안 했어."

TextEng: "I'd like to go into the dungeon now. That is, unless you have some more useless advice you want to pass on."
Text: "이제 던전에 들어가고 싶어. 쓸모없는 조언 더 하고 싶은 게 아니라면 말이야."

TextEng: "I'll be careful."
"You think I'm special? I think you're special, too."
Text: "내가 특별하다고 생각해? 나도 네가 특별하다고 생각해."

TextEng: "I'll be careful."
"So how are we supposed to cross it?"
"You think this river will stop the army of the Valsharess?"
Text: "이 강이 발샤레스의 군대를 막을 거라고 생각해?"

TextEng: "I can look after myself, drow."
"It doesn't seem that bad too me."
"It's unsettling, but I'll be okay."
"I still don't trust you, drow. If you betray me..."
Text: "아직도 널 믿지 않아, 드로우. 날 배신하면..."

TextEng: "I'll keep that in mind."
"Thank you, Nathyrra. It's good to know I have your support."
Text: "고마워, 나시라. 네 지지가 있다는 걸 알게 돼서 좋아."

TextEng: "You're worried about me?"
"Is this some kind of drow come on?"
"I don't want to discuss this now."
"You came with me. Expect to die."
"Yes. Let's go."
"No, not right now."
"You keep dying. That's a problem."
"Your skills are stealth and secrecy. Try to stay out of combat."
Text: "네 기술은 은밀함과 비밀이야. 전투에서 벗어나 있도록 해."

TextEng: "Don't worry. I won't abandon you, Nathyrra."
"Nathyrra doesn't answer to you, Aribeth!"
"She has a point, Nathyrra."
"Stop it, both of you."
